TMIgraph Class Reference

(Topology Manager) This is a representation of the network topology (using the iGraph library) for the Topology Manager. More...

 the length in bytes of the LIPSIN identifier.
string mode
 mode in which this Blackadder node runs - the TM must create the appropriate netlink socket.

Detailed Description

(Topology Manager) This is a representation of the network topology (using the iGraph library) for the Topology Manager.

void TMIgraph::calculateFID ( set< string > &  publishers,
set< string > &  subscribers,
map< string, Bitvector * > &  result 
)

it calculates LIPSIN identifiers from a set of publishers to a set of subscribers using the shortest paths.

Parameters:
publishers a reference to a set of node labels, representing the source nodes.
subscribers a reference to a set of node labels, representing the destination nodes.
result a reference to a map where the method will put node labels representing source nodes mapped to LIPSIN identifiers. Note that some of these identifiers may be NULL.
Bitvector * TMIgraph::calculateFID ( string &  source,
string &  destination 
)

it calculates a LIPSIN identifier from source to destination using the shortest path.

Parameters:
source the node label of the source node.
destination the node label of the destination node.
Returns:
a pointer to a bitvector that represents the LIPSIN identifier.
int TMIgraph::readTopology ( char *  name  ) 

reads the graphml file that describes the network topology and creates some indexes for making the operation faster.

Currently iGraph cannot read the Global Graph variables and, therefore, this methid does it manually.

Parameters:
name the /graphML file name
Returns:
<0 if there was a problem reading the file
